DefineList.Id: PIO List for Wired Audio Detection Inputs

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: Value is expressed in steps
Value is expressed in steps
Value is expressed in steps
Value is expressed in steps
Value is expressed in steps
Value is expressed in steps

ConfigItem.Desc: The elapsed time, in seconds, before the device is powered off after a wired audio source is connected.

Analogue audio disconnection debounce period in milliseconds. Prevents the audio stream from being destroyed and then recreated in quick succession if the analogue audio detection changes within the specified time.
Determines the sampling rate used for the analogue wired audio input. Note: High Resolution sample rates (88.2 and 96 kHz) are not available on CSR8670.

ConfigItem.Id: Wired audio maximum input sampling rate for spdif
ConfigItem.Desc: Determines the maximum sampling rate used for the spdif wired audio input. Note: High Resolution sample rates (88.2 and 96 kHz) are not available on CSR8670.

ConfigItem.Id: Output sampling rate when routing wired audio sources
ConfigItem.Desc: Set the playback sample rate to use when routing analogue, I2S or SPDIF inputs. Note that if a resampling rate is explicitly set for the I2S output it will override this value. When the wireless subwoofer functionality is enabled all output playback is at a fixed rate of 48kHz which will also override this setting.
This configures a PIO to detect when SPDIF audio is being used e.g. when a connector is plugged in. This may also be configured to always assume this input is connected or disabled entirely.
This configures a PIO to detect when analog audio input is being used, e.g. when a connector is plugged in. This may also be configured to always assume this input is connected or disabled entirely.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF376_CG724 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

ConfigItem.Desc: This configures a PIO to be used for SPDIF input, this is required for CSR8675 and must be an odd number. This should be disabled for CSR8670 (SPDIF will still function)
This configures a PIO to detect whether the I2S audio being used. e.g. when a connector is plugged in. This may also be configured to always assume this input is connected or disabled entirely

This sets a PIO to be configured for SPDIF ouput, this should be configured for CSR8675 and must be an even number. This should be set to 'N/A' for SPDIF output on CSR8670 (SPDIF output will still function)

ConfigItem.Id: Power Off after Wired Audio Connected
ConfigItem.Desc: When set the Sink is powered off after the wired audio is connected

ConfigItem.Id: Play from physical connections in limbo state
ConfigItem.Desc: Setting this bit will result in the Sink playing from configured USB, SPDIF and analog inputs when in limbo.
This configuration item specifies the audio instance for I2S Input. For QCC300x, if Audio Instance 1 is selected then PCM block 2 will be used instead of PCM block 1 for I2S input.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF133 CF133_SQIF CG793 CG437 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CF376_CG724 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA H13503v2 QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA H13179v2_H13478v2 CNS10001v4

ConfigItem.Desc: This configuration item specifies the audio instance for SPDIF Input. For QCC300x, if Audio Instance 1 is selected then PCM block 2 will be used instead of PCM block 1 for SPDIF input.

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: This configuration item specifies the SPDIF Input audio bit resolution. Bit depth is fixed internally at 24 bit and this configuration item is only applicable to CSR8675 and CSR8676 parts. Note that only 16 bit config is valid for CSR8670. Furthermore it is supported for PCM audio over SPDIF only and not for any other coded audio.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF133 CF133_SQIF CG793 CG437 CF376_CE692 CF376_CE692H3 CF376_H13732 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CF376_CG724 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: Specifies the target latency, in ms. Expected to be in the range of 0 to 150ms. Note: this configuration item is only applicable to CSR8670 and CSR8675

ConfigStruct.Id: Instance of a structure I2S pskey configuration

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: This setting determines which I2S plug-in should be used. The options availlable are to use; A)The provided Qualcomm plug-in which can be configured through this tool to target a wide selection of I2S interfaced devices;B)Preconfigured settings for the Qualcomm SSM_2518 I2S Development Board; C)Preconfigured settings for Qualcomm CSRA_6620 (Diamond) I2S development board; D)A customer developed plug-in.
Specifies Master or Slave Operation.
Choose between left justified and right justified I2S data.
The I2S data can be delayed by 1 bit.

Specifies the number of bits in each audio sample. Bits per sample should be less than or equal to bit depth. If 24 bit operation is defined, Bits per sample should be configured to a minimum of 24 bits.

StructElementConfigItem.Id: I2C Raw Command Data Configuration Length
StructElementConfigItem.Desc: Specifies the length of the I2C Raw Command Data block.
Specifies how many I2C Initialisation commands are specified in the Raw Command Data

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF133 CF133_SQIF CG793 CG437 CF376_CE692 CF376_CE692H3 CF376_H13732 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CF376_CG724 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: Specifies the number of individual I2C volume commands that will be sent to the I2S capable device every time a volume change is made.
Specifies the offset, in words, of the first I2C Volume command specified in the Raw Command Data
Specifies the number of individual I2C commands that will be sent to the I2S capable device every time the device is shut down, i.e. on close of SCO or A2DP media stream.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF133 CF133_SQIF CG793 CG437 CF376_CE692 CF376_CE692H3 CF376_H13732 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CF376_CG724 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: Specifies the offset, in words, of the first I2C Shutdown command specified in the Raw Command Data
Specifies the number of bits of the volume setting in the I2C command.
Specifies the maximum volume value that will be sent to the I2S device to indicate maximum output level.
Specifies the minimum volume value that will be sent to the I2S device to indicate minimum output level.

Forces re-sampling of all audio outputs to a fixed sample rate when an I2S output is configured, specified in Hz. A value of 0 disables re-sampling. Note, I2S outputs do not support re-sample rates less than 44100Hz, any attempt to force a rate lower than 44100Hz will result in no audio on the I2S output.

Specifies the voice (CVC) output sample rate when an I2S output is configured, in Hz. A value of 0 disables re-sampling. Note, I2S outputs do not support sample rates less than 44100Hz, any rate lower than this will be overridden by the application.
Specifies the I2S bit clock rate (BCLK) as a multiple of the sample rate, output when running in I2S Master mode.

Specifies the I2S master clock rate (MCLK) as a multiple of the sample rate. This is used to drive the bit and word clocks when running in I2S Master mode, so must always be higher than the bit clock scaling factor. In I2S Slave mode, the MCLK of an external device may be used to drive the audio interface logic synchronously. A value of 0 disables MCLK input/output.

BuildVariant.HwVariant: CF133 CF133_SQIF CG793 CF376_CE692 CF376_CE692H3 CF376_H13732 CF376_CE826 CF376_CF212 CF376_CF429 CF376_CF440 CF376_CF897 QCC3024-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3034-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5124-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3020-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3021-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC3031-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5120-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5126-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AA_DEV-BRD-R2-AA QCC5127-AB_DEV-BRD-R2-AA

StructElementConfigItem.Desc: This configuration item specifies the I2S Input audio bit resolution. Note: this configuration item is only relevant for I2S audio input. Furthermore it is only applicable to CSR8675 and CSR8676 parts and not for CSR8670.
Specifies the PIO to enable external I2S device.
